issues.summary: [BE][Refinement] Enhanced Customization and ERP Integration for Crop Protection Products
[BE][Refinement] Transition api-node-cropwise-notes and api-node-cropwise-custom-attribute from AWS Lambda to ECS/EKS
[FE][Refinement] Implement configurable front-end catalog filters for user-driven customization, focusing on favorites and hide functionalities
[FE][Refinement] Productize CW Elements with clear scope, creation standards, and documentation practices
[INFRA][Refinement] Improve monitoring, alerting, and incident response for Catalog services using DataDog and Opsgenie
[Refinement] Complete Demeter handoff, monitor usage, remove resources, and transfer ownership
[FE][Refinement] Add the new workspace type for field production on the Staff Console
[BE][Refinement] Ensure the Sampling work record fits Planting use case 2
[FE][Refinement] Implement divisions and map functionality for Hall of Entities
[BE][Refinement] Get Item and Fertilizer data from Agrian
[BE][Refinement] Enhancing CP Catalog with Product Efficacy Data
[BE][Refinement] Migrate orgs to Tube-based CP catalog, ensuring data completeness and custom product creation
[FE][Refinement] Create the farm field tree navigation for the product top bar
[FE][Refinement] Deliver enhancements to Fertilizer MFE for consistency with new Inputs MFE
[FE][Refinement] Deliver enhancements to Crop Protection MFE for consistency with new Inputs MFE
[FE][Refinement] Improve Other Categories MFE UI/UX and backend for integration into unified Inputs screen
[FE][Refinement] Enhance and document the translation process to improve clarity and efficiency in Cropwise products
[FE][Refinement] Integrate Notes library into CW Elements as a micro-frontend for improved efficiency and maintainability
[FE][Refinement] Develop a Micro Frontend for creating and editing organizations with enhanced functionality and performance
[FE][Refinement] Enhance Contacts Page: New Fields, CSV Export, Multi-select, and Contact as a Member
